headline.main: R.A.F. AIDE PRAISES U.S. DAY BOMBING; Says Americans Complement British Efforts -- Wants More of Our Help ALLIED BOMBERS GROUNDED Fighters Shoot Up Barges and Locomotives in France -- 10 Die in Raid on England

lead_paragraph: LONDON, June 2 (U.P.) -- A Royal Air Force spokesman today enthusiastically praised the American air offensive in the European theatre and urged that the United States send more bombers immediately.
abstract: Under-Sec A H Balfour cites US daylight raids on Italy without loss
snippet: LONDON, June 2 (U.P.) -- A Royal Air Force spokesman today enthusiastically praised the American air offensive in the European theatre and urged that the United States send more bombers immediately....
